scripts.make-react-app: npm create vite@latest frontend -- --template react && cd frontend && npm i react-router-dom axios && node ../configerFrontend.js && cd ..
scripts.make-server-app: mkdir backend && cd backend && npm init -y && npm i express cors pg jsonwebtoken dotenv nodemon bcrypt && node ../configerBackend.js && npm run makeServerDirectory && cd ..
scripts.shower:
echo 'All done!
You can type(in terminal):
npm run build-and-run to build and run the app.
Or npm run build-and-dev to build and run the app in development mode.'
scripts.init: npm run make-react-app && npm run make-server-app && npm run shower
scripts.init-and-run: npm run init && npm run build-and-run
scripts.init-and-dev: npm run init && npm run build-and-dev
scripts.build-and-run: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run start
scripts.build-and-dev: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run dev
